UoA MediaplayerPlus Blog

UoA MediaplayerPlus

Improvements to the Mediaplayer used by the University of Auckland

Features

  • Download button for watching lectures offline
  • Keyboard shortcuts:
    • ‘J’ and ‘L’ for seeking
    • ‘K’ to play/pause
    • ‘F’ to go fullscreen
    • ’>’ to speed up and ‘<’ to slow down
  • Automatically skip copyright notice
  • Various other fixes and improvements
